backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling auth, user profiles, presence tracking, and chat messaging with permission checks and message validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining color tokens, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component configuring providers and routing between Discovery, Chat, and Games screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChallengeBa: Dropdown for initiating backend-driven Tic-Tac-Toe or Connect Four challenges with auto-accept logic.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input component handling text and image messages, enforcing size limits and sending via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders individual chat messages with optional images and timestamps, supporting self and peer alignment.
frontend/src/components/chat/TypingIndic: Displays a simple animated indicator showing that the user is typing.
frontend/src/components/connection/Conne: Shows a badge indicating whether the local connection state is connected or disconnected.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Device: Card UI for discovered devices showing activity status and a connect button.
frontend/src/components/discovery/RadarS: Animated radar-style scanning visual used during device discovery.
frontend/src/components/games/GameStateD: Debug panel that displays any game state as pretty-printed JSON inside a scrollable area.
Main application shell with header, theme toggle, login, connection status, data clearing, and screen navigation.
frontend/src/games/connect4/ConnectFourB: UI for playing Connect Four, handling moves, resets, and rendering the board with status indicators.
frontend/src/games/connect4/engine.ts: Core Connect Four logic including state initialization, move handling, and win/draw detection.
frontend/src/games/connect4/types.ts: Type definitions for Connect Four players, board cells, game status, and overall state.
frontend/src/games/tictactoe/engine.ts: Implements Tic-Tac-Toe game logic including move validation, win checking, and state updates.
frontend/src/games/tictactoe/TicTacToeBo: React UI for Tic-Tac-Toe that handles moves, reset actions, and syncing game state with a peer via mutations.
frontend/src/games/tictactoe/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for Tic-Tac-Toe players, board, game status, and state structure.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Provides centralized React Query key generators for profiles, peers, messages, and game state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and hooks for loading, logging in, and clearing Internet Identity sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentState.ts: Custom hook that syncs React state to localStorage with automatic load and save behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, presence, messages, and game interactions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTypingIdle.ts: Tracks typing activity and exposes an idle flag based on a timeout.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/chatLimits.ts: Defines maximum allowed text and image sizes for chat messages.
frontend/src/lib/fileToUint8Array.ts: Converts browser File objects into Uint8Array buffers using FileReader.
frontend/src/lib/gameSerialization.ts: Serializes and deserializes Tic-Tac-Toe and Connect Four game states to and from JSON strings.
frontend/src/lib/heartbeatSimulation.ts: Simulates periodic connection health updates via a timed callback.
frontend/src/lib/imageEncoding.ts: Provides utilities for converting files to base64 data URLs and data URLs to Blob objects.
frontend/src/lib/localPersistence.ts: Helpers for loading, saving, and removing JSON data in localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/simulatedDiscovery.ts: Provides a mock device discovery function returning randomized last-seen timestamps for demo devices.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/screens/ChatScreen.tsx: Displays chat messages, connection status, and message composer, handling authentication and message loading states.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoveryScreen.tsx: Manages peer discovery, presence updates, and connection state, showing scanning UI and peer counts.
frontend/src/screens/GamesScreen.tsx: Shows minigame options or active game state for a connected peer, handling authentication and loading errors.
frontend/src/state/localNexusStore.tsx: Defines context for managing local connection state and selected peer with setters and reset helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
